dataJson.description: A project built for freecodecamp.com in 2016, the requirement then were to build a TIC TAC TOE game
dataJson.name: Tic Tac Toe Game
dataJson.story: A Tic Tac Toe game with AI. It uses an implementation of the MinMax algorithm, and calculates the most efficient move. This project took a while as I had to study how the algorithm works, but I managed to pull it of in the end. It offers basic options but the challenge was not about the options.

techs.description: A CSS library for responsive web design
techs.name: Bootstrap
